Introduction
============

This is a plugin for `TinyMCE`__ editor for Plone.
__ http://plone.org/products/tinymce/

Adding more styles for images for TinyMCE (use the blue tree icon)
(you can enable the other (the green tree) from the tinymce control panel 


Changelog
=========

0.2 
--------
- Made the dialog box a bit bigger
- Fixed storing of styles so they show in dialog box when editing image
- Hid the "normal green tree" image button.

0.1 
--------
- added css for the image styles

0.0.1 alpha
-----------
- Initialversion
